mapper.sql: ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, ACCOUNT, UNIT, PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE
mapper.select: select od.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, od.ORDER_ID, od.PRODUCT_NAME, od.PRODUCT_ID, od.ACCOUNT, od.UNIT, od.PRICE, od.TOTAL_PRICE from t_order_details od left join t_order o on od.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID where o.ORDER_ID = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_order_details (ORDER_DETAIL_ID, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_ID, ACCOUNT, UNIT, PRICE, TOTAL_PRICE) values (#{orderDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into t_order_details
ORDER_DETAIL_ID,
ORDER_ID,
PRODUCT_NAME,
PRODUCT_ID,
ACCOUNT,
UNIT,
PRICE,
TOTAL_PRICE,

mapper.update:
update t_order_details
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_order_details set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where ORDER_DETAIL_ID = #{orderDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
